DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myComments: This is a primitive script that shows how to create simple state machines in Lua. The script itself doesn't provide a very useful movement model.
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: This task moves a ship in a given heading using a Zig-Zag pattern.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>heading</myVariableName> <myType>heading</myType> <myLabel>Heading</myLabel> <myToolTip>Direction of travel (Deg)</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
